column4: ok i have a error on startup after installing so i re inserted live cd and mounted that volume  does this mean if i run sudo i am working on the mounted volume?

ok i have a error on startup after installing so i re inserted live cd and mounted that volume  does this mean if i run sudo i am working on the mounted volume?
No You'll have to cd to where you mounted it .. and then work on the file system .. if you really want to work like you are "on the machine" you'll need to chroot it
